text: Muhammad Saalih al Munajjid (Arabic: مُحَمَّدٌ صَالِحٌ الْمُنَجِّدُ) (7 June 1960-present) is a Palestinian Islamic scholar who was born in Syria and currently lives in Saudi Arabia. He founded the online fatwa service IslamQA.info, a popular online fatwa service used by followers of Wahhabism and Salafism.Richard Gauvain, Salafi Ritual Purity: In the Presence of God, p 355. == Early life and education == Muhammad was born in the city of Aleppo, Syria in the year 1960 but grew up in Saudi Arabia."Women in Islam: Behind the veil and in front of it" Deutsche Welle, 1 October 2016. He studied Islamic law under Ibn Baz, Ibn Uthaimeen, Ibn Jibreen, and al-Barrak.About, islamqa.info.
